summary.span: 提供与当前应用程序相关的属性、方法和事件。

span.span: Provides properties, methods, and events related to the current application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公开的属性`My.Application`对象仅与当前应用程序或 DLL 相关联的返回数据。The properties exposed by the `My.Application` object return data that is associated only with the current application or DLL. 无法使用 `My.Application` 更改任何系统级信息。No system-level information can be altered with `My.Application`. `My.Application` 对象由以下类组成：The `My.Application` object consists of the following classes: - 提供了所有项目中的可用成员。 provides members that are available in all projects. - 提供了 Windows 窗体应用中的可用成员。 provides members available in Windows Forms applications. - 提供了控制台应用中的可用成员。 provides members available in console applications. ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Application.CommandLineArgs`属性可以检查应用程序的命令行自变量。This example uses the `My.Application.CommandLineArgs` property to examine the application's command-line arguments. 如果自变量找到以开头`/input=`，则显示该参数的其余部分。If an argument is found that starts with `/input=`, the rest of that argument is displayed. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CommandLineArgs As ReadOnlyCollection(Of String)

summary.span: 获取一个集合，该集合包含当前应用程序的字符串形式的命令行参数。

span.span: Gets a collection containing the command-line arguments as strings for the current application.

value.span: 类型的 ，包含当前应用程序的命令行参数，参数形式为字符串。

span.span: A of , containing the command-line arguments as strings for the current application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.CommandLineArgs`属性提供只读访问权限的不部署的 ClickOnce 应用程序的当前应用程序的命令行参数。The `My.Application.CommandLineArgs` property provides read-only access to the current application's command-line arguments for applications that are not ClickOnce deployed. 对于单实例应用程序，`My.Application.CommandLineArgs`属性返回应用程序的第一个实例的命令行参数。For a single-instance application, the `My.Application.CommandLineArgs` property returns the command-line arguments for the first instance of an application. 若要访问的后续尝试启动单实例应用程序的自变量，你必须处理事件并检查属性自变量。To access the arguments for subsequent attempts to start a single-instance application, you must handle the event and examine the property of the argument. > [!NOTE] > `My.Application.CommandLineArgs`属性返回仅命令行自变量。The `My.Application.CommandLineArgs` property returns only the command-line arguments. 这是不同的行为属性，它返回除了自变量的应用程序名称。This is different from the behavior of the property, which returns the application name in addition to the arguments. > [!NOTE] > 在为部署的 ClickOnce 应用程序，使用属性`My.Application.Deployment`对象来获取命令行自变量。In an application that is ClickOnce deployed, use the property of the `My.Application.Deployment` object to get the command-line arguments. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 下表列出了所涉及的任务的示例`My.Application.CommandLineArgs`属性。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Application.CommandLineArgs` property. |到To|查看See| |-|-| |检查后续尝试启动单实例应用程序的命令行参数Check the command-line arguments of subsequent attempts to start a single-instance application|| ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|否No| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|否No| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Application.CommandLineArgs`属性可以检查应用程序的命令行自变量。This example uses the `My.Application.CommandLineArgs` property to examine the application's command-line arguments. 如果自变量找到以开头`/input=`，则显示该参数的其余部分。If an argument is found that starts with `/input=`, the rest of that argument is displayed. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

permission.span: 控制访问的 PATH 环境变量的能力。

span.span: Controls the ability to access the PATH environment variable.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Deployment As ApplicationDeployment

summary.span: 获取当前应用程序的 ClickOnce 部署对象，该对象为以编程方式更新当前部署提供支持，并支持文件的即需下载。

span.span: Gets the current application's ClickOnce deployment object, which provides support for updating the current deployment programmatically and support for the on-demand download of files.

value.span: 返回应用程序的 ClickOnce 部署的 对象。

span.span: Returns the object for the application's ClickOnce deployment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.Deployment`属性返回应用程序的 ClickOnce对象。The `My.Application.Deployment` property returns the application's ClickOnce object. 对象提供支持以编程方式更新当前部署以及对按需下载文件的支持。The object provides support for updating the current deployment programmatically as well as support for the on-demand download of files. ClickOnce 应用程序以及如何将它们部署的详细信息，请参阅[ClickOnce 安全和部署](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/abab6d34-c3c2-45c1-a8b6-43c7d3131e7a)和[发布 ClickOnce 应用程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/eb6dfe79-f54c-4331-8e36-073688e70973)。For more information on ClickOnce applications and how to deploy them, see [ClickOnce Security and Deployment](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/abab6d34-c3c2-45c1-a8b6-43c7d3131e7a) and [Publishing ClickOnce Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/eb6dfe79-f54c-4331-8e36-073688e70973). 确认属性是`True`你访问之前`My.Application.Deployment`属性。Confirm that the property is `True` before you access the `My.Application.Deployment` property. 否则，如果不使用 ClickOnce 部署的应用，则读取`My.Application.Deployment`属性将导致异常。Otherwise, if the application is not deployed using ClickOnce, reading the `My.Application.Deployment` property results in an exception. 有关部署 ClickOnce 应用程序的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 发布 ClickOnce 应用程序使用发布向导](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2e4aa67c-4445-4f7b-9e03-9acb95829127)。For more information on deploying a ClickOnce application, see [How to: Publish a ClickOnce Application using the Publish Wizard](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2e4aa67c-4445-4f7b-9e03-9acb95829127). 有关详细信息使用`My.Application.Deployment`属性，请参阅[Visual Basic 应用程序模型概述](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information on using the `My.Application.Deployment` property, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md). ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|否No| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|否No| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例下载并安装在检查，应用程序通过网络部署后的更新。This example downloads and installs the update after checking that the application is network-deployed. 方法不会更新应用程序，除非它已过期。The method does not update the application unless it is out of date. 该应用程序重新启动以使用的更新。The application has to restart to use the update. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#4)] 可以使用更新仅应用程序部署的 ClickOnce`My.Application.Deployment`对象。Only applications that are ClickOnce deployed can be updated using the `My.Application.Deployment` object. 有关部署 ClickOnce 应用程序的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 发布 ClickOnce 应用程序使用发布向导](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2e4aa67c-4445-4f7b-9e03-9acb95829127)。For more information on deploying a ClickOnce application, see [How to: Publish a ClickOnce Application using the Publish Wizard](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2e4aa67c-4445-4f7b-9e03-9acb95829127).

exception.span: 应用程序未部署为 ClickOnce 应用程序。

span.span: The application is not deployed as a ClickOnce application.

permission.span: 控制文件和文件夹的访问权限。

span.span: Controls the ability to access files and folders.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Property InternalCommandLine As ReadOnlyCollection(Of String)

summary.span: 设置要用作当前应用程序的命令行参数的值。

span.span: Sets the values to use as the current application's command-line arguments.

value.span: 一个 类型的 ，包含要用作当前应用程序的命令行参数的字符串。

span.span: A of , containing the strings to use as the command-line arguments for the current application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法允许你设置由使用的命令行自变量的内部值类。This method allows you to set the internal value of the command-line arguments used by the class. 此属性会确定属性返回。This property determines what the property returns. 如果你未设置此属性，或将此属性设置为`Nothing`、属性获取的命令行参数从属性。If you do not set this property, or you set this property to `Nothing`, the property obtains the command-line arguments from the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsNetworkDeployed As Boolean
public: property bool IsNetworkDeployed { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个 值，该值表示应用程序是否是使用 ClickOnce 从网络部署的。

span.span: Gets a that represents whether the application was deployed from a network using ClickOnce.

value.span: 一个 值，表示应用程序是否是从网络部署的。

span.span: A that represents whether the application was deployed from a network.

value.span: 如果已通过网络部署了当前应用程序，则值为 ；否则值为 。

span.span: The value is if the current application was deployed from a network; otherwise the value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.IsNetworkDeployed`属性指示是否从网络使用 ClickOnce 部署应用。The `My.Application.IsNetworkDeployed` property indicates whether the application was deployed from a network using ClickOnce. ClickOnce 应用程序的详细信息，请参阅[ClickOnce 安全和部署](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/abab6d34-c3c2-45c1-a8b6-43c7d3131e7a)。For more information on ClickOnce applications, see [ClickOnce Security and Deployment](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/abab6d34-c3c2-45c1-a8b6-43c7d3131e7a). 您应确认，此属性是`True`你访问之前属性。You should confirm that this property is `True` before you access the property. 否则，如果未从网络使用 ClickOnce 部署应用程序，读取`My.Application.Deployment`属性将导致异常。Otherwise, if the application is not deployed from a network using ClickOnce, reading the `My.Application.Deployment` property results in an exception. 配置 ClickOnce 的详细信息，请参阅[发布 ClickOnce 应用程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/eb6dfe79-f54c-4331-8e36-073688e70973)。For more information on configuring ClickOnce, see [Publishing ClickOnce Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/eb6dfe79-f54c-4331-8e36-073688e70973). 有关部署 ClickOnce 应用程序的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 发布 ClickOnce 应用程序使用发布向导](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2e4aa67c-4445-4f7b-9e03-9acb95829127)。For more information on deploying a ClickOnce application, see [How to: Publish a ClickOnce Application using the Publish Wizard](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2e4aa67c-4445-4f7b-9e03-9acb95829127). 有关详细信息使用`My.Application.IsNetworkDeployed`属性，请参阅[Visual Basic 应用程序模型概述](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information on using the `My.Application.IsNetworkDeployed` property, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md). ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|否No| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|否No| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例下载并安装在检查从网络中部署应用程序后的更新。This example downloads and installs the update after checking that the application is deployed from a network. 方法不会更新应用程序，除非它已过期。The method does not update the application unless it is out of date. 该应用程序重新启动以使用的更新。The application has to restart to use the update. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#4)] 可以使用更新仅应用程序，ClickOnce 部署，则部署`My.Application.Deployment`对象。Only applications that are ClickOnce-deployed can be updated using the `My.Application.Deployment` object. 有关部署 ClickOnce 应用程序的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 发布 ClickOnce 应用程序使用发布向导](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2e4aa67c-4445-4f7b-9e03-9acb95829127)。For more information on deploying a ClickOnce application, see [How to: Publish a ClickOnce Application using the Publish Wizard](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2e4aa67c-4445-4f7b-9e03-9acb95829127).

permission.span: 控制文件和文件夹的访问权限。

span.span: Controls the ability to access files and folders.
